name: Question Quest
description:
Made for A Game By Its Cover 2017 game jam. Some content had to be cut out so some functionalities might seem useless, for now. I hope to update it with at least a few more features I had imagined for it.  I hope you enjoy!

CONTROLS
Left/Right Arrow Keys - Scrolling through targets & spells

Up/Down Arrow Keys - Increasing & decreasing spell strength (When Choosing a spell)

Number Keys - Typing your answer

Backspace Key - Correcting your answer

Return/Space bar Key - Selection & entering your answer

Famicase: http://famicase.com/17/softs/111.html

Music by Rolemusic @ freemusicarchive.org
